title: Client crashing after login after update
body:
I have a pretty crappy old Win7 laptop, but it has always run LoL just fine. However, until recently I had access to a better computer, and haven't patched on this laptop since May.

Today I lost access to the better machine, and updated LoL on this one. The update seemed fine, but now when I log in, the client (almost) immediately crashes (stops responding to input, and after a while Windows reports it has stopped working). I usually get about half a second to click on things before it freezes; I've managed to do things like open the personalized store page or minimize a chat window.

I've tried restarting the computer, but I'm not really sure what else to try. I also signed up for the alpha client in case that runs better, but I haven't been approved yet. Some people are counting on me to play later today, so i hope I can get this fixed soon! Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client may be disconnecting from our servers and causing the freezes and eventual crash. In this case, I'd recommend you check out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some steps that may resolve this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
